You will
refer to me as Embla.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|W-wait!$k$p$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Askr must die.
And so must you.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Here, now!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p

$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face_Pain|A-agh...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Stop! Stop or she'll—$k$pSissy! Listen to me!$k$p$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Give up.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|This body is mine, and I have
no intention of letting go.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|As long as she lives, I will never
let go now.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|P-please stop! If you don't stop,
Letizia will die!$k$p$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Let me kill you then.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Ooh... Wait, wait...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|I can feel her hate... It burns
within her, screaming her wish
to kill you herself...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Such loathing...
Such malice... Very well...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|I will allow you use of your body...
for this. Now, kill them!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Veronica...$k$pI will not allow...someone else the
privilege of killing you. I cannot...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I dreamed of you finally dying...
And yet here, now...I cannot let
it happen...$k$pBut I know...life will never again be
like it was in childhood... That door
is closed...and only one now remai—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Nya-aaaugggh...$k$p$Sbs150|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$Fi500|...$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sissy! ...No!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|She...sacrificed herself.$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE05_05,0|With her last breath, Letizia fought
to protect you, Veronica...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_レティシア洗脳,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Enemy,Face_Pain|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|This body may be spent...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Cool|...I, however, remain.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-how?!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Destroy as many of my puppets
as you please. No harm will come
to me.$k$p$EFace_Cool|You two... Yes, both of you...
My blood runs in your veins,
does it? Hmm...$k$pAnd you are not alone... I sense two
others here carry my blood as well...
How interesting...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Two others?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Wh-what?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Hm-hm-hmh... Well then... Which of
you shall I make my next puppet?$k$p$EFace_Cool|I will start with... Hmm... You.$k$pYou are now mine to control!$k$pThere is no way out! Submit to me!
Hm-hm... Hm-hm-hmh-ha-HAH!$k$p$Sbs150|
